thread.title: Central NY man convicted of murder
thread.title_full: Central NY man convicted of murder - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Central NY man convicted of murder
text:
SYRACUSE, N.Y. (AP) - A 20-year-old central New York man has been convicted of murder in the shooting death of another man.
A jury found Isiah Graham of Syracuse guilty of shooting 19-year-old Marquell Givens in the back of the head and taking the victim's gun last November.
Givens died at Upstate University Hospital days later.
The Post-Standard of Syracuse reports ( http://bit.ly/1VUUwAT ) the prosecution's case was complicated by the fact Graham was not arrested the day of the crime and that police had another suspect immediately after the shooting.
Givens was not shot to death by his own gun.
Graham, who was not arrested until the victim's stolen gun was found a week later, had pictures of both guns on his cell phone. He faces 25 years to life in prison when sentenced.
